sentences.english: One Deutsches Volkslied by Jahannes Brahms of your own choice.
sentences.chinese: 自选一首勃拉姆斯的德国民谣。

sentences.english: Balladry says Song is not vocal only.
What have been recorded in the book are just a small part of Huizhou ballads.
sentences.chinese: 而书中采集的民谣也仅仅只是徽州民谣的一少部份。

sentences.english: What have been recorded in the book are just a small part of Huizhou ballads.
sentences.chinese: 而书中采集的民谣也仅仅只是徽州民谣的一少部份。

sentences.english: This balladry spoke the four seasons succinctly also to wash crural benefit.
sentences.chinese: 此民谣也简练地道出了四季洗脚的益处。

sentences.english: He always includes a few folk songs on his programs; they are his stock in trade .
sentences.chinese: 在他的节目中总是包括几首民谣，那是他的惯用手段。

sentences.english: The cowboy has told his own story in many songs and ballads.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔们用许多歌曲和民谣来叙述他们自己的故事。

sentences.english: The school ballad I want to recommend is Ye Bai He Ye You Chun Tian.
sentences.chinese: 今天的校园民谣，我选得是《野百合也有春天》。

sentences.english: She quavered an old folk song.
sentences.chinese: 颤声唱一首古老的民谣。

sentences.english: This article is the narrative balladry of river Huang area.
sentences.chinese: 此文为河湟地区的叙事民谣。

sentences.english: Patriotic folk songs are common, mostly written during the Israeli wars.
sentences.chinese: 爱国的民谣很常见，大多是在以色列战争期间写的。

sentences.english: As though some ballad singer had sung it all.
sentences.chinese: 仿佛某个民谣歌手己把它全部唱完。

sentences.english: She belted out ballads and hillbilly songs one after another all evening.
sentences.chinese: 她整晚一个接一个地大唱民谣和乡村小调。

sentences.english: He also wrote three piano sonatas, choral music, and more than 250 lieder .
sentences.chinese: 他还写了三首钢琴奏鸣曲和近两百五十首民谣歌曲。

sentences.english: Their music has been described as "subtly intoxicating folk-pop".
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐被描述为“灵巧地使人陶醉的流行民谣”。

definition: speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]/(music) rapping
to sing and play (plucked string instrument)
